name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lynn A. PADGETT, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lynn A. PADGETT, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of April, 2011, the Petition to Stay Proceedings Pending Verification of Subject-Matter Jurisdiction and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
17 A.3d 922
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lynn A. PADGETT, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 20, 2011.
